article.title: Alliant to Update Spider Software
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Alliant Techsystems Incorporated, Plymouth, Minnesota, was awarded a $7,950,322 firm-fixed-price contract for the Spider Software Block-4 updates in support of the Spider Joint Venture.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, New Jersey is the contracting activity.
